title: Ironhold Fortress
text: Carved directly into the living granite of the Northern Peaks, Ironhold Fortress is a testament to dwarven engineering and human stubbornness. It is considered the most secure location on the continent, with walls fifty feet thick and reinforced with runic wards. Ironhold houses the legendary Anvil of Crom, an artifact from the First Age where the first magical weapons were forged. The city within the mountain is self-sufficient, powered by geothermal vents and mushroom farms. It is a grim, disciplined society where every citizen is trained in combat from the age of ten.
image_prompt: Massive fortress carved into a mountain, snowy peaks, fortified walls, dwarf-inspired architecture.
